displayName.text: Advance Care Alliance of New York

formattedAddress: 1410 Broadway 2nd floor, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1410 Broadway 2nd floor, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: Advance Care Alliance is an amazing Care management  company. They've been working with my daughter for over 5 years. They provide the best quality services. With such amazing care coordinators. Especially Ms Marion Hutchinson. Who are always available whenever I needed to reach her. Always treat my daughter and I with respect, Very caring and compassionate.She's so knowledgeable of my daughter needs and care. And do everything possible to make sure she have the best quality of care. if I reach out to her after hours. She will get back to me at her earliest convenience. She's truly the best. I'm so grateful to ACA and their wonderful team. I really appreciate you all. Happy new year.

originalText.text: So far this has been the best care management I have worked with for my Son in the years we have been working with different agencies . The communication with the care management team and parents has been good in my opinion. They text, call and email all things  that are hard to come by with care management in my opinion.  Sign up your loved one!

originalText.text: the terrible service due to having multiple care managers is their high turnover. Just look at the reviews at the top job listing agencies. Case Managers are being treated and paid like peasants while the executive leadership team makes millions each year and the only way they are able to  make that amount is due to billing that Care Managers submit.

originalText.text: We experienced an easy transition to Advance Care Alliance last month, and already see such a difference. Someone always answers the phone when we call, everyone knows what is happening with our case, and our Care Manager is super well-informed and committed.  I'd give 10 stars if I could!

text.text: We experienced an easy transition to Advance Care Alliance last month, and already see such a difference. Someone always answers the phone when we call, everyone knows what is happening with our case, and our Care Manager is super well-informed and committed.  I'd give 10 stars if I could!

originalText.text: The case planner knows her client and tries to accommodate his needs.  She has worked triedly trying to get the proper services as his condition continues to change.  When she doesn't have an answer to one of my questions, she always ask her supervisor and gets right back to me.
